ygData.msgSnippet: Part of the point of this topic is pointing out things we have to watch for if we ever get around to having a tournament. At high experience levels, Archers

Part of the point of this topic is pointing out things we have to 
watch for if we ever get around to having a tournament.

At high experience levels, Archers are just as dangerous [exploding 
arrow] as thieves.  With my archmage, I just summon an image, let it 
die, and then turn it into a very threatening ghost or skeleton.

I'm still concerned that my newest scenario 'Weakest Link' is too 
difficult.  Telvido, I am probably going to send it to you as an 
attachement to evaluate for being too difficult.  Anyone else who 
wants a shot at it, email me personally (as opposed to the list) with 
the word Gladiator' somewhere in the subject line.
